'''Conner Squire''' is the son of [[Edward Squire]].

==History==
Conner was called to the hospital after his father was in an accident. By the time he arrived, his father was already dead. [[Isaac Cross]] informed him of his father's death and he shoved Isaac to the floor.

==Relationships==
===Familial===
He was called to the hospital because his father had been in an accident. When he heard that his father had died, he shoved Isaac to the floor because he was upset.
